name: BBCWorld
text:
Lockdowns are starting to ease around the world, with elements of life returning to normal

But what are the risks of coronavirus infection as people are spending more time together?

[Thread] 

https://t.co/4Cl84qljcx

name: BBCWorld
text:
From returning to offices to restaurants reopening, we‚Äôll be in closer proximity to each other than we have been for some time

Evidence about how coronavirus is transmitted is slim; the science is still uncertain

But what do we need to consider?

https://t.co/4Cl84qljcx https://t.co/K0j31OdIZb

name: BBCWorld
text:
Distance üßç‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è‚ùåüßç‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

When someone coughs, they expel droplets 

Research shows that most of those evaporate or fall to the ground within one metre

The WHO recommends one metre for social distancing, but this varies from country to country

https://t.co/4Cl84qljcx https://t.co/RGAVer4y2H

name: BBCWorld
text:
Face-to-face interaction üó£Ô∏è

How long you spend face-to-face with someone can also be risky 

If social distancing isn‚Äôt possible the UK government recommends limiting time together to 15 minutes 

https://t.co/4Cl84qljcx https://t.co/yV9G8b8RwL

name: BBCWorld
text:
Particles are exhaled while speaking

Dr Tang says that if you can smell your colleague‚Äôs breath, you‚Äôre too close 

"If you're inhaling enough of that air to smell it, then you're close enough to inhale any virus that's also carried in the air with it"

https://t.co/4Cl84qljcx https://t.co/VzW8XwkDpM

name: BBCWorld
text:
Indoor ventilation 

Some research suggested a cluster of outbreaks in Guangzhou was caused by infected droplets circulating in air conditioning

There is no proof that coronavirus can be spread this way, but it‚Äôs important not to rule out the possibility

https://t.co/4Cl84qljcx https://t.co/NO7A1Dh2KC

name: BBCWorld
text:
Surfaces in public places 

When an infected person transmits the virus by shaking hands or infecting communal surfaces there is also a level of risk 

This is why hand washing is so important üö∞

https://t.co/4Cl84qljcx https://t.co/KGa2HmYHpm
